translation.trans_thisisanupdate: This is an update of your order in our webshop
translation.trans_ordercollected: Your order has been collected in our warehouse, we will handover your order to our postal service as soon as possible
translation.trans_thisorderisabout: This message concerns your order with reference number
translation.trans_ifyouhaveanyfurtherquestions: If you have any further questions please email us at
